section.title: Installing External JDBC Driver
section.para: In order to use a JDBC Virtualhost Node or a JDBC Virtualhost, you must make the Database's JDBC 4.0 compatible drivers available on the Broker's classpath. To do this copy the driver's JAR file into the \${QPID_HOME}/lib folder.
